Clash, flying around after Nightlight, suddenly had a sword brought down
onto his back. He dropped and hit the ground with a thud. He looked up to
see Aerotaur.

Clash: What is this? Where is your...honor...

Clash smiled as he said the last word. The honor line. Honor was something
Atma believed in...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, January 13, 2001 8:53 AM
Subject: Re: Neutral base under attack!!!!!


> ::Aerotaur::
>     On his way back to the base he picked up the transmission from Red
Bolt.
> By the time he gets there Aerotaur sees Freewing taking off and heading
for
> their base.  At the base he lands and returns to his bot mode.  There he
sees
> Nightlight and Perplex fighting with two unknown bots and a third unknown
bot
> helping them, sort of.  He looks between them and decides that Perplex is
> fine.  He turns and leaps at Clash drawing his staff and slashing at his
> back.
>
>
>
